definition: lit. even a submissive daughter-in-law will one day become a domineering mother-in-law (idiom)/fig. the oppressed will become the oppressor/what goes around comes around
to cook on a slow fire/to extract by heating/to decoct/to endure
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
see 媳婦熬成婆|媳妇熬成婆[xi2 fu4 ao4 cheng2 po2]
pinyin: duo1 nian2 xi2 fu4 ao2 cheng2 po2
